Contributing
============

Enhancements
------------

Requests should be submitted on the `Issues tracker \
<https://github.com/elParaguayo/LMSTools/issues>`_ on Github.

Please submit any pull requests to the development branch. Requests to master \
will be rejected.

Bugs
----

Bugs should be logged on the `Issues tracker \
<https://github.com/elParaguayo/LMSTools/issues>`_.
